attributes.action: Re-think the social networking monitoring plans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned feel that this encroachment upon our civil liberties is neither ethical nor will it be effective.

To store data that links members of the public to suspected members of organised crime cannot work as there would be no record of intention. To then dig deeper into someone's life in order to discover an intention of contact would then be required which is stripping us of freedom and therefore assists the terrorists in their objectives.

If you want to defeat terrorist control, promote freedom at any cost. The British people will carry on as normal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
